item.prototype_pain.large_medibag.discri: A spacious medical kit that can hold up to 12 items.
item.prototype_pain.medium_medibag.discr: A balanced pack with room for 8 items.
item.prototype_pain.small_medibag.discri: A compact pouch for 4 medical items.
item.prototype_pain.alcohol.discription: Used to disinfect wounds before treatment.
item.prototype_pain.antibiotics.discript: Helps fight off infections and speed up recovery.
item.prototype_pain.dressing.discription: Basic bandage for covering and protecting wounds.
item.prototype_pain.ice_pack.discription: Reduces swelling and eases sore muscles.
item.prototype_pain.plastic_dressing.dis: Stronger bandage, protects wounds more effectively.
item.prototype_pain.saline.discription: Restores fluids and stabilizes patients in emergencies.
Cleans and covers wounds, preventing infection.
item.prototype_pain.blood_thinner.discri: Prevents dangerous clotting, but increases bleeding risk.
item.prototype_pain.heroin.discription: Strong narcotic with high addiction risk. Overdose risk at ~50%
item.prototype_pain.morphine.discription: Good old reliable pain relief. Overdose risk at ~90%
item.prototype_pain.opium.discription: Traditional narcotic, less potent but risky in excess. Overdose risk at ~200%.
item.prototype_pain.painkillers.discript: General medication to reduce pain and discomfort.
item.prototype_pain.splint.discription: Stabilizes broken bones and aids healing.
item.prototype_pain.tourniquet.discripti: Stops heavy bleeding but limits blood flow.
item.prototype_pain.tweezers.discription: Removes shrapnel, glass, or debris from wounds.
item.prototype_pain.blood_clotting.discr: Globally slows down blood loss, including internal bleeding. Likely to cause clotting.
